Sign up
Register for the international conference09 May 2021

Creative changes begin with the decision of people, and this decision becomes the beginning of the future!\n\nA large-scale teleconference on May 9, 2020 is organized by people themselves on their own in their countries and regions!
EN

The realities of our time: military threats and conflicts, geopolitical tensions, millions of refugees, children dying of hunger, economic crises - all this against the backdrop of rapidly growing climatic disasters that pose humanity with a key choice between the survival or death of civilization.

And this is all the result of the consumer format of society. Are we dreaming of such a world? Is such a future we want for our children and grandchildren? Is this the world in which we ourselves want to live?
BUT HUMANITY HAS A CHANCE

A unique world-wide event “SOCIETY. LAST CHANCE ”on May 9, 2020, on the platform of the ALLATRA International Public Movement, will unite people from 180 countries of the world in one online teleconference in an open global dialogue:
“Do we want a constructive society?”
On May 11, 2019, a unique event of global scale took place on the platform of ALLATRA International Public Movement - an international video-conference “SOCIETY. THE LAST CHANCE”..
Photos
See All

MAY 11, 
2019.

How it was
Hundreds of thousands of people will participate in this world event
on the third Saturday of May 2021

including diplomats, leaders of various international and non-profit organizations, politicians, scientists, representatives of the media, culture and socially active people from different countries. Interactive video broadcast in real time with simultaneous translation into different languages ​​of the world will allow a lively dialogue between people from different continents.

At this historic international video conference, thousands of people from all over the world will have the opportunity to come together and share their opinions and visions of what the future of our society should be like.

International conference 
"SOCIETY. LAST CHANCE" 
May 9, 2020.
Unite and create!
“We would already live in a constructive society today if we had begun to act yesterday. And yesterday they would start acting if the day before yesterday they started talking about him. ”
I. M. Danilov
